fields.option_a: A branch of science focused on studying human psychology
fields.option_b: The process of designing computer games
fields.option_c: The simulation of human intelligence in machines
fields.option_d: The development of physical robots only

fields.text: Which of the following is NOT a type of machine learning?
What distinguishes Machine Learning from traditional programming?
fields.option_a: Machine Learning models rely on fixed rules defined by humans
fields.option_b: Machine Learning models learn patterns from data
fields.option_c: Machine Learning does not require any data
fields.option_d: Traditional programming can handle image recognition better than Machine Learning

fields.text: Which of the following is an example of supervised learning?
fields.option_a: Grouping customers based on purchasing behavior
fields.option_b: Predicting house prices based on features like area and number of rooms
fields.option_c: Detecting unusual transactions without labeled data
fields.option_d: Training a robot to learn from rewards in a game environment

fields.text: What is the role of a dataset in Machine Learning?
fields.option_a: To provide training and testing data for the model
fields.option_b: To create a database of rules
fields.option_c: To store the output of the model

fields.text: What is a common application of AI in daily life?
fields.option_b: Spam email filtering in mail services
fields.option_c: Writing code for computer programs manually

fields.text: What does "unsupervised learning" aim to do?
fields.option_a: Predict a target variable using labeled data
fields.option_b: Find hidden patterns in unlabeled data
fields.option_c: Simulate human intelligence for logical tasks
fields.option_d: Train robots to follow human instructions

fields.text: Which of the following is an example of reinforcement learning?
fields.option_a: Clustering news articles based on their content
fields.option_b: Teaching a robot to walk by rewarding it for each successful step
fields.option_c: Predicting stock prices using historical data
fields.option_d: Identifying spam emails based on labeled examples

fields.text: Which of these statements is true about deep learning?
fields.option_a: It is a subset of reinforcement learning
fields.option_b: It does not use neural networks
fields.option_c: It requires large amounts of data to perform well
fields.option_d: It is primarily used for clustering

fields.text: What is the primary objective of Machine Learning?
fields.option_a: To make machines conscious like humans
fields.option_b: To build hardware that mimics the human brain
fields.option_c: To write manual code for all decision-making processes
fields.option_d: To enable machines to learn from data and make decisions

fields.name: Introduction to Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning
